HeroInfo.description: A stalwart defender with unmatched strength. Wields heavy armor and weapons, protecting allies while dealing devastating melee damage.
HeroInfo.playstyle: Get in close and deal consistent damage while absorbing enemy attacks

HeroInfo.description: A veteran warrior forged in countless battles. Specializes in defensive tactics and outlasting enemies through superior endurance.
HeroInfo.playstyle: Extreme durability and defense, absorbs massive amounts of damage

HeroInfo.description: A fierce warrior who values speed over raw defense. Delivers rapid strikes with medium armor for balanced offense and defense.
HeroInfo.playstyle: Fast-paced melee combat with balanced offense and defense

HeroInfo.description: A colossal warrior wielding a massive two-handed weapon. Trades speed for overwhelming power with each strike.
HeroInfo.playstyle: Devastating slow attacks that hit extremely hard

HeroInfo.description: A dual-wielding warrior who sacrifices defense for rapid, relentless assault. Glass cannon melee fighter with high risk, high reward.
HeroInfo.playstyle: Extremely aggressive high-speed melee with low survivability

HeroInfo.description: A master of elemental magic who rains destruction from afar. High damage output but fragile - positioning and mana management are key.
HeroInfo.playstyle: Maximize spell damage while managing mana and staying out of danger

HeroInfo.description: A brilliant arcane scholar who prioritizes raw magical power. Highest damage potential but requires careful mana management.
HeroInfo.playstyle: Maximum spell power with lowest survivability - nuclear glass cannon

HeroInfo.description: A frost mage who balances damage with survivability. Ice shields provide extra protection while slowing enemies.
HeroInfo.playstyle: Balanced caster with defensive capabilities and crowd control

HeroInfo.description: A storm mage specializing in quick-casting lightning spells. Fast casting speed with moderate damage per hit.
HeroInfo.playstyle: Rapid-fire spell casting for consistent damage output

HeroInfo.description: A scholarly mage focused on mana efficiency and long-term sustainability. Lower burst but never runs out of mana.
HeroInfo.playstyle: Efficient spell usage with excellent mana regeneration

HeroInfo.description: Swift and deadly, striking from the shadows. Relies on critical hits and burst damage to eliminate high-priority targets quickly.
HeroInfo.playstyle: Focus on eliminating priority targets with high burst damage and crits

HeroInfo.description: A poison specialist who weakens enemies over time. Applies deadly toxins that continue damaging after initial strikes.
HeroInfo.playstyle: Apply poison effects and let damage over time do the work

HeroInfo.description: A versatile assassin with balanced stats. Reliable critical strikes and good survivability for a rogue.
HeroInfo.playstyle: Well-rounded assassin with good damage and survivability

HeroInfo.description: The ultimate glass cannon rogue. Unmatched attack speed and critical chance but extremely fragile.
HeroInfo.playstyle: Lightning-fast attacks with maximum crit - dies if touched

HeroInfo.description: A disciplined rogue who focuses on precision over speed. Higher damage per hit with controlled, tactical strikes.
HeroInfo.playstyle: Slower but harder-hitting strikes with good positioning

HeroInfo.description: A divine healer who supports allies with healing and protective magic. Keeps the party alive through the toughest battles.
HeroInfo.playstyle: Keep allies alive with healing while contributing moderate damage

HeroInfo.description: A devoted healer who maximizes healing output. Best support in the game but minimal combat capability.
HeroInfo.playstyle: Maximum healing power - keep allies alive at all costs

HeroInfo.description: A militant cleric who deals holy damage to enemies. Combines decent damage with moderate healing capabilities.
HeroInfo.playstyle: Balance between dealing holy damage and supporting allies

HeroInfo.description: A defensive cleric who protects allies with shields and barriers. Focuses on damage prevention over healing.
HeroInfo.playstyle: Prevent damage with shields while providing emergency healing

HeroInfo.description: A mystic healer with powerful buffs and enhanced mana pool. Provides utility beyond just healing.
HeroInfo.playstyle: Enhance allies with buffs while maintaining healing support

HeroInfo.description: An expert marksman with deadly precision. Excels at dealing consistent damage from range with high critical strike chance.
HeroInfo.playstyle: Maintain distance and deliver precise, high-damage attacks from range

HeroInfo.description: A wilderness ranger who excels at tracking and taking down single targets. Reliable sustained ranged damage.
HeroInfo.playstyle: Consistent ranged damage with good survivability

HeroInfo.description: An agile ranger with the fastest attack speed. Lower damage per shot but overwhelming volume of arrows.
HeroInfo.playstyle: Rapid arrow volleys - death by a thousand cuts

HeroInfo.description: A patient marksman who waits for the perfect shot. Slow but extremely powerful attacks with high crit damage.
HeroInfo.playstyle: Devastating single shots - each arrow is a kill shot

HeroInfo.description: A ranger who commands nature's fury. Balanced stats with good survivability and utility.
HeroInfo.playstyle: Well-rounded ranger with pet support and good versatility

HeroInfo.description: A holy warrior who balances offense and defense. Can heal allies while dealing respectable damage to enemies.
HeroInfo.playstyle: Balance between dealing damage, tanking, and supporting allies

HeroInfo.description: A righteous paladin focused on dealing holy damage to evil. Strong offense with divine protection.
HeroInfo.playstyle: Holy warrior dealing bonus damage to undead and demons

HeroInfo.description: A protective paladin who shields allies from harm. Highest defense among paladins with area protection.
HeroInfo.playstyle: Maximum protection - intercept attacks meant for allies

HeroInfo.description: A fervent holy warrior who sacrifices defense for righteous fury. High damage output with moderate tankiness.
HeroInfo.playstyle: Aggressive holy warrior - offense is the best defense

HeroInfo.description: A veteran templar with decades of experience. Perfectly balanced stats make them effective in any situation.
HeroInfo.playstyle: Jack of all trades - adapts to any party composition
